articles.title: Personal loans register robust growth in February, shows RBI data
articles.description: Credit growth to industry accelerated to 6.5 percent in February 2022 from one percent in February 2021, the central bank data revealed.
articles.content:
Personal loans grew by 12.3 percent in February 2022 on a year-on-year basis, marking a strong pick-up in demand in the segment, data released by the Reserve Bank of India (RBI) showed.
